attributes.action: BRİNG BRİTİSH CİTİZEN AND FAMİLY SAFELY HOME AFTER WESTGATE TERROR ATTACK
attributes.additional_details: british citizen lynsey and her family from south wales were hostaged and shot at in westgate mall attacks in nairobi. lynsey went public appealing to her goverment to bring her family home to safety which was ignored. she warned more attacks to hit nairobi and 3 al shabaab attacks have now hit. she fears for her and her 4 year old son and husband. kindly support her in order to get her home along with her husband and son. many thanks for your support!
